isis.stitle: AIR CONDITIONING PROTECTION AND DIAGNOSTIC SYSTEM (APAds™) DESCRIPTION, OPERATION, TROUBLESHOOTING, REMOVE, INSTALL, AND ELECTRICAL CIRCUIT DIAGRAMS MAINTENANCE MANUAL - OPERATION - APADS MODULE

svcprocinfo.para: The APADS module is connected to the vehicle electrical system through two connectors: (936) and (937).

svcsubproc.title: Battery Feed
svcsubproc.para: The module receives battery power (key ON or OFF) from 10A fuse F10-A at connector (421) circuit 14G.

svcsubproc.title: Ignition Feed
svcsubproc.para: The module receives ignition power (key ON) from 10A fuse F10-A. This powers the module.

svcsubproc.title: Module Ground
svcsubproc.para: The module is grounded through connector (936) circuit 18BK and 77-GAC through the cab harness to the ground stud on the right dash panel [(gnd stud 938 in 9800), (gnd stud 886 in 9100, 9200, 9300, 9400 and 9900)] and 77-G (gnd stud 2G in 4000 & 8000).
